pull.title: Utils and libraries: Removes the boost/algorithm/string/join dependency
pull.body: This commit removes the `boost/algorithm/string/join` dependency from the project by replacing `boost::algorithm::join` with the helper function proposed by @MarcoFalke in https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13726#discussion_r204159967

events.body:
~Given it's only used in the one place, I'd be inclined to make it static to the file used, or making a more narrow util file for it.~

I like Marco's idea.

Thanks @MarcoFalke and @Empact, appreciate the feedback! 

I have implemented the proposed helper function in f94ec7c and updated the pull request description accordingly.

events.message:
Removes the boost/algorithm/string/join dependency

This commit removes the `boost/algorithm/string/join` dependency
from the project by replacing `boost::algorithm::join` with
a simple helper function.

events.body:
Thanks @Empact, yeah your right. I didn't expect that one üëç 
Addressed in 5f019d5.

utACK 5f019d5354cb12e343ea4bb88da04fbe0e98f102

Thanks for helping remove our Boost dependencies! Please continue :-)

issue.title: commits from bitcoin/master
issue.body:
tests: fixes mininode's P2PConnection sending messages on closing transport
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13715

depends: disable Werror when building zmq
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13689

[trivial] Correct help text for `importaddress` RPC
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13074

wallet: Fix non-determinism in ParseHDKeypath(...). Avoid using an uninitialized variable in path calculation.
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13712

Add createwallet "disableprivatekeys" option: a sane mode for watchonly-wallets
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/9662

docs: Specify preferred Python string formatting technique
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13718

p2p: Remove dead service bits code
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11637

lint: Add linter for circular dependencies
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13695

Remove boost::program_options dependency
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13482

Fix bitcoin-cli --version
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13725

Utils and libraries: Removes the boost/algorithm/string/join dependency
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13726

wallet: Introduce assertion to document the assumption that cache and cache_used are always set in tandem
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13683

trivial: Replace CPubKey::operator[] with CPubKey::vch where possible
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13722

Remove redundant variables, statements and forward declarations
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13691

doc: Remove field in getblocktemplate help that has never been used.
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/12764

Avoid locking mutexes that are already held by the same thread
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11762

Utils: Refactor ArgsManager a little
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13733

Drop dead code from Stacks
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13633

Net: Fixed a race condition when disabling the network.
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13212

trivial: remove unneeded include
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13740

Avoid creating a temporary vector for size-prefixed elements
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13719

tests: Skip P2PConnection's is_closing() check when not available
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13747

issue.title: ci: Cleanup macOS runs
issue.body:
* Remove a commented out cleanup task in `before_cache`
* Remove the linter run on macOS, and document that GNU tools are required to run the linters

comments.body: I don't think `c_str` is needed here.
